TestSuite: This endpoint fetches document detail by case number and document id

TC_01.TestCaseName: TC_01 It should receive 200 and return base64 of image when valid doc_id and valid id is passed as input @Smoke @Sanity @Regression @ServiceMerchantDataAPI

TC_02.TestCaseName: TC_02 It should throw 404 and should not return base64 of image when invalid doc_id and valid id is passed as input  @Regression @ServiceMerchantDataAPI

TC_03.TestCaseName: TC_03 It should throw 404  and should not return base64 of image when valid doc_id and valid id is passed as input  @Regression @ServiceMerchantDataAPI

TC_04.TestCaseName: TC_04 It should throw   and should not return base64 of image when invalid  doc_id and invalid id is passed as input  @Regression @ServiceMerchantDataAPI
